components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
h2. Problem

In production, for all platforms, there are always bugs and issues not noticeable before. You can never simulate every environment.

h2. Request

It would be more than helpful to have a way to capture all the native console output in order to send it home for later examination or other use cases.
fields.summary: API: Capture native exceptions and Ti.API logging output in JS context

comments.body: Good luck with that, I tried to pursue same quest some time ago, but failed. :)
